column1: Río Cauto is a municipality and town in the Granma Province of Cuba. It is located in the northern part of the province
column2: upstream of the mouth of Cauto River.
the municipality of Río Cauto had a population of 47
column5: it has a population density of 31.9/km2 (83/sq mi).
